name: Zera:Reborn
description:
CMPM171 Project: Zera: Reborn is an MMORPG game, we are still in development, but most of the primary system is complete and playable; we will still be developing this game in CMPM172!

Present by: DFSStudio

Member:

Project owner: Felix Li 

Designer: Michelle Kim, Jacob Phung, Ziyang Li

Artist:  Daniel Zhong, Spencer Kim, Yan Yang, Christopher Mathie, Marshall Zhao

Musician:  Siwen Tao

Programmer: Chunxuan Zhao, Martin Perina,  Felix Li

 Instructions: The local server needs to set up the environment with the SQL server & link to our game server. About the remote server (since we are students and we can't buy a good one), we will open it as long as possible. This option can be directly played!
